name: PoolZ
description:
Relax, it is time to pop some balls!

Enjoy & have fun! That’s pretty much it.
Send your ball into the colored ones to make them disappear and then score, collect invaluable currency stars and clean your board.
Watch out for the bombs, they explode and make you lose after 5 turns! Touch them to eradicate them before it is too late!

Be careful, highly addictive game!
